Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class LightLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalization
  • public class LightLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for odometry correction and robot localization using light sensors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LightLocalization()
      Creates a LightLocalization object

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void odoCorrectionFirst()
      Corrects the ev3 along the y axis, first part of the light correction
      void odoCorrectionSecond()
      Corrects the ev3 along the x axis, second part of light sensor correction
      void singleLineCorrection​(double turnBy)
      Light sensor correction along a single line used before and after the tunnel to insure straight line travel through said tunnel
      void updateOdometer()
      This method updates the odometer coordinates to that of the point the odoCorrection just localized to

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • singleLineCorrection

        public void singleLineCorrection​(double turnBy)
        Light sensor correction along a single line used before and after the tunnel to insure straight line travel through said tunnel
        Parameters:
        turnBy - initial angle to turn by to align axle along the line that we want to correct with

      • odoCorrectionFirst

        public void odoCorrectionFirst()
        Corrects the ev3 along the y axis, first part of the light correction

      • odoCorrectionSecond

        public void odoCorrectionSecond()
        Corrects the ev3 along the x axis, second part of light sensor correction

      • updateOdometer

        public void updateOdometer()
        This method updates the odometer coordinates to that of the point the odoCorrection just localized to
